sentence.Network_en: The abnormality mitral stenosis was in myocardium, not in the valve.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from modern Latin mitralis, from Latin mitra 'belt or turban'

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or located in or near the mitral valve;
2. relating to or resembling the miter worn by some clerics
